comment: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113, 2nd paragraph on p. 114. ` X ` represents t_1. In their notation, we prove p ` \/ ` t_1 = p ` \/ ` t. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
